Package pl.pz1.poker.gameplay

Class Player

java.lang.Object
pl.pz1.poker.gameplay.Player
public class Player extends Object
The Player class represents a player in the poker game. It manages player-specific data, such as the player's hand, bets, moves, and game-related information.
